LanguageData.VBE_HotCoffeeHigh.stages.0.label: Brewed awakening
LanguageData.VBE_HotCoffeeHigh.stages.0.description: That coffee hit the spot, now let’s get some work done.
LanguageData.VBE_IcedCoffeeHigh.stages.0.label: Icy awakening
LanguageData.VBE_IcedCoffeeHigh.stages.0.description: Nothing better than iced coffee to refresh yourself.
LanguageData.VBE_CaffeineWithdrawal.stages.1.label: caffeine withdrawal
LanguageData.VBE_CaffeineWithdrawal.stages.1.descript: God I'm tired. Everything's so annoying, my hands are shaking and my head is pounding.
LanguageData.VBE_EnergyDrinkHigh.stages.0.label: I feel like I’ve been given wings!
LanguageData.VBE_EnergyDrinkHigh.stages.0.description: Oof, that energy drink has me bouncing off the walls!
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoHigh.stages.0.label: smooth and mild
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoHigh.stages.0.description: That cigarette was just what I needed, such a smooth flavor.
LanguageData.VBE_DeluxeTobaccoHigh.stages.0.label: puffing on luxury
LanguageData.VBE_DeluxeTobaccoHigh.stages.0.descripti: A cigar makes me feel like I’ve made it big in life.
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoWithdrawal.stages.1.label: tobacco withdrawal
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoWithdrawal.stages.1.descripti: I really wish I could smoke. I'd kill for a cigarette.
LanguageData.VBE_DrankSoda.stages.0.label: Sugar rushed
LanguageData.VBE_DrankSoda.stages.0.description: I drank a sweet, fizzy soda, a small but welcomed luxury.
LanguageData.VBE_DrankTea.stages.0.label: Fancied a cuppa
LanguageData.VBE_DrankTea.stages.0.description: A delightfully simple cup of tea really brightens the day.
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaAsIngredient.stages.0.label: Drank tequila-based cocktail

LanguageData.VBE_CiderHigh.stages.0.label: cider warmth
LanguageData.VBE_CiderHigh.stages.0.description: I just feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.
